properties.name: sizeRestriction
properties.description: Setup file size restriction in MB

properties.name: acceptedFiles
properties.description: Set allowed type restriction like: Array types ['jpg', 'png'] or String like provided for default

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Represents the validation state of the component

properties.name: initialImageCover
properties.description: Set initial cover of the image

events.name: input
events.description: emitted if the file is updated or removed, this will be used for v-model
